name: Mud Slinger
storyline: Annie comes to earth and lands a job as barista at The Bitter End. People come in, serve them coffee, get tips, how hard can it be?
summary: Mud Slinger is a lightweight, single player game about daily work as a barista at a cafe, the endless parade of weird people asking stupid, stupid questions, tipping poorly, and of course, wild rabid badgers coming through the door. You know, daily life stuff.
